violacoes.violacao: Ensure that the page, or at least one of its frames contains a level-one heading
violacoes.como_corrigir: Page must contain a level-one heading

elementos_afetados.texto_contexto:
Fix all of the following:
  Page must have a level-one heading

violacoes.violacao: Ensures all page content is contained by landmarks
violacoes.como_corrigir: All page content must be contained by landmarks

elementos_afetados.texto_contexto:
Fix any of the following:
  Some page content is not contained by landmarks

violacoes.violacao: Ensures role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
violacoes.como_corrigir: ARIA role must be appropriate for the element
